mapper.insert: insert into iot_device_management.device(device_name, type, description, user_id, create_time, last_active_time, clientId) values (#{deviceName}, #{type}, #{description}, #{userId}, #{createTime}, #{lastActiveTime}, #{clientId});
mapper.select: select count(*) from device where device_id = #{deviceId};
select count(*) from device where user_id = #{userId};
mapper.update: update device set device_name = #{deviceName} where device_id = #{deviceId}
update device set type = #{type} where device_id = #{deviceId}
update device set description = #{description} where device_id = #{deviceId}
mapper.select: select device_id from device where client_id = #{clientId};
select count(*) from device where client_id = #{clientId};
